publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-496 Rhona Brankin: Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004-That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish football team on reaching the play-off stages of the UEFA Euro 2004 tournament; notes the magnificent contribution made by Midlothian's own Darren Fletcher to the team's success, and wishes the entire squad the best of luck for the play-off against the Netherlands.

S2M-496 Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004 (lodged on 14 October 2003) Elaine Smith*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Dennis Canavan*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Karen Gillon*, Robin Harper*
S2M-496 Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004 (lodged on 14 October 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-496 Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004 (lodged on 14 October 2003) Irene Oldfather*, Bristow Muldoon*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-496 Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004 (lodged on 14 October 2003) Iain Smith*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-496 Scottish Football Team and Euro 2004 (lodged on 14 October 2003) Pauline McNeill*
